name: Blue in Green
comments: haha...so right u are vvollero...in this piece alone...hearing a thesis or two...or three...encyclopedia on LP...

Remembering what could have been beautiful and wonderful .......but wasn't.
Sadness in thinking with regret what has happened. Regret for causing unhappiness. Fond memories of the good times. Consoling music. The blues. Green is envy. Blue is sad.

zapatosgrandes
a dance between the comfort and familiarity of sadness, and the remote desire for air, light, and hope...  so true
Thank you Bill and Miles. Evans, you were miles ahead.

This will definitely be played at my funeral. That should slow things down.
Beautiful. Sums up my life very well. One long struggle to overcome the blues with a plea for the green revolution of eco sustainable zero carbon technologies to replace the horrendous destruction of our green planet.
this will be played at my funeral
and for just a moment, everything slowed down.
